sentences.en: a bent nail
sentences.cn: 弯曲的钉子

sentences.en: a bent old man (=  not standing straight  )
sentences.cn: 一个驼背老汉

sentences.en: He bent down and picked up a rock.
sentences.cn: 他弯下腰捡起一块石头。

sentences.en: He bent forward and laid a kiss softly upon her forehead.
sentences.cn: 他弯身向前，在她额头上轻轻一吻。

sentences.en: He bent to a squat and gathered the puppies on his lap.
sentences.cn: 他弯腰蹲下，把小狗们都抱到自己腿上。

sentences.en: He breathed in deeply, bent double in pain (=  with the top part of your body leaning forward towards your legs  ) .
sentences.cn: 他深深地吸着气，痛得直不起腰来。

sentences.en: His long legs bent up in the confined space.
sentences.cn: 他的两条长腿蜷在狭小的空间里。

sentences.en: I bent over and kissed her cheek.
sentences.cn: 我俯身亲吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.en: Keep your knees slightly bent.
sentences.cn: 保持双膝稍稍弯曲。

sentences.en: Nick's head bent slowly over hers until their mouths met.
sentences.cn: 尼克慢慢向她低下头去，直到他们的嘴唇碰在了一起。

sentences.en: Pickers are bent double, plucking each flower with lightning speed.
sentences.cn: 采花人弓着身子飞快地摘着花。

sentences.en: She bent over and unbuckled her sandals.
sentences.cn: 她弯下腰解开了凉鞋搭扣。

sentences.en: She planted her feet wide and bent her knees slightly.
sentences.cn: 她双脚宽分站稳，膝盖微屈。

sentences.en: She was bent over the sink washing the dishes.
sentences.cn: 她俯在水槽边洗盘子。

sentences.en: Some unions seem bent on confrontation, alas.
sentences.cn: 一些工会看起来倾向于对抗。

sentences.en: Stand with your knees slightly bent.
sentences.cn: 双膝微曲站立。

sentences.en: The messenger bent and scratched at his knee where the strapping chafed.
sentences.cn: 送信人弯下腰来，挠着膝部被绑腿磨红的地方。

sentences.en: The rod bent double, the reel shrieked and ratcheted.
sentences.cn: 操作杆进一步弯曲，线轴发出刺耳的吱吱声。

sentences.en: Then she bent over and gave him an eyeful of her tattoos.
sentences.cn: 接着她弯下身子，让他好好看清楚她的文身。

sentences.en: They walked in a crouch, each bent over close to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们每个人都俯身贴近地面蹲伏着前进。

words.tran_cn: 弯曲木材制的；弯木制的

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)愤怒的；焦躁不安的

trans.tran_cn: 弯曲的，折断的，驼背的，不正派的

trans.tran_en: special natural skill or interest in a particular area

trans.tran_cn: 弯腰，（使）弯曲，屈从，拐弯，篡改，歪曲（bend的过去式）
